item.title: Support
item.description: Quick debug and FAQ Check the Quick debug if you encounter an issue when trying to use Reachy or if you have a question, check if it is part of our FAQ. Discord Join our Discord if you have any questions, maybe someone has already asked the same question or other people could benefit from the answer! ðŸ‘‰ Any questions relative to your development with Reachy?Join the Pollen Community on Discord Pollen Robotics support For any specific questions concerning your robot or if you meet problems with the product, please contact us at support@pollen-robotics.
